Description_lang: Teleports you to a major city.
Teleports you to a major city.
Call an active Pet to your side.
Summons one of your demons to you.
Creates a portal, teleporting group members who use it to a major city.
Creates a portal, teleporting group members who use it to a major city.
Apply potent venom to your weapons.
Instantly summon a second demon, who fights for 25 sec.

Teleport to the entrance of a Mists of Pandaria dungeon for which you have earned a Gold medal or Keystone Hero achievement. The cooldown of these spells will reset when you complete a Mythic Keystone Dungeon.
Alternate cosmetic variants of Polymorph, which transform your target into a variety of creatures.
Modify your ranged weapon to use exotic munitions.

Teleport to the entrance of a Warlords of Draenor dungeon for which you have earned a Gold medal or Keystone Hero achievement. The cooldown of these spells will reset when you complete a Mythic Keystone Dungeon.
A variety of tools to help you manage your pet.
Alternate cosmetic variants of Hex, which transform your target into a variety of creatures.
Play an instrument of the Kyrian.
Adapt yourself to a type of magic, changing your breath attack.
Teleport to the entrance of a Shadowlands Dungeon for which you have earned the Keystone Hero achievement. The cooldown of these spells will reset when you complete a Mythic Keystone Dungeon.
Teleport to the entrance of a Shadowlands Raid. Only available after earning the Mythic: Fates of the Shadowlands Raids achievement.
Teleport to the entrance of a Battle for Azeroth Dungeon for which you have earned the Keystone Hero achievement. The cooldown of these spells will reset when you complete a Mythic Keystone Dungeon.
Teleport to the entrance of a Legion Dungeon for which you have earned the Keystone Hero achievement. The cooldown of these spells will reset when you complete a Mythic Keystone Dungeon.
Shows the location of nearby creature types on the minimap.
Shows the location of nearby gathering reagents on the minimap.
Teleport to the entrance of a Dragonflight Dungeon for which you have earned the Keystone Hero achievement. The cooldown of these spells will reset when you complete a Mythic Keystone Dungeon.
Take to the skies on a Skyriding mount, using these abilities to navigate through the air.
Teleport to the entrance of a Cataclysm Dungeon for which you have earned the Keystone Hero achievement. The cooldown of these spells will reset when you complete a Mythic Keystone Dungeon.
Teleport to the entrance of a Dragonflight Raid. Only available after earning the Mythic: Awakening the Dragonflight Raids achievement.
Teleport to the entrance of a The War Within Dungeon for which you have earned the Keystone Hero achievement. The cooldown of these spells will reset when you complete a Mythic Keystone Dungeon.
Maximize your Warband's collaborative potential with these abilities.
Input a number sequence to a nearby device.
Teleport to the entrance of a War Within Raid. Available after reaching maximum Renown with certain factions or other heroic deeds.
